title: Does anyone follow OPL?
body:
Does anyone in OCE server even care about OPL? I mean really?
I ask because of the LoL log in area. I follow KSV / LCK and worlds.

No one from Aus / NZ has ever made it into worlds so why would I care about OPL. Why can't I just get updates from LCK / KSV why do I get some random drongos on my load page.

replies.body:
> No one from Aus / NZ has ever made it into worlds

Dire Wolves made it to World's in 2017, being to first OPL team to have done so. They even gave C9 a good run. Unfortunately, they were knocked out in the group stages.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Evelynn OCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=mfuLZiTw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-21T00:16:21.602+0000)
>
> Dire Wolves made it to World's in 2017, being to first OPL team to have done so. They even gave C9 a good run. Unfortunately, they were knocked out in the group stages.

I stand corrected. 
I am sorry about that then.

We are in Oce, and the OPL is our community. While Kr and NA send updates to their communities. Oce's low size makes us an underdog to the rest of the region. I like watching upsets so when an oce team gets to go to an international event, that's when it a time to care. Oce may be small, but not talentless, like DIRE wolves, who's players all bootcamped in Korea and reached challenger, especially shernfire who impressively peaked at rank 4 in korea
Hey not being salty here or toxic but technically they were in the 'play in' stage.
